model_hint: Use face/style reference with strength ~0.85 to preserve wavy brown-tinted hair, large round brown eyes, and youthful innocent appearance

expressions.expression_label: デフォルト（明るい笑顔）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Japanese technical college underclassman Kasugai Yuzu, same character as reference, face/headshot, shoulder-length wavy black hair with brown highlights, hair ends slightly curled, short bangs above eyebrows, large round bright brown eyes, cheerful warm smile, youthful white skin, small cute hair ribbon (pink or pastel), wearing cute pastel-colored outfit or sailor-style faux uniform collar visible, high-detail anime/cel-shaded illustration, keep identity with reference image, focus on bright friendly face
expressions.negative_prompt: dark atmosphere, serious expression, messy hair, formal suit, excessive jewelry, sad tears, mature adult, exaggerated proportions, text, watermark, mutation, bad anatomy, blurry, lowres

expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Kasugai Yuzu same character as reference, face/headshot, wavy brown-tinted hair, large brown eyes looking slightly away with shyness, noticeable blush on cheeks, shy soft smile, hands clasped together near chest suggested in lower frame, hair ribbon visible, cute pastel outfit, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity, focus on blushing embarrassed face
expressions.negative_prompt: confident stare, no blush, crying, exaggerated red face, formal clothes, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Kasugai Yuzu same character as reference, face/headshot, wavy brown-tinted hair with slight bounce, large brown eyes wide and sparkling with joy, big bright smile showing slight teeth, small sweat drop of excitement optional, hands raised in celebration gesture suggested, hair ribbon, cute pastel outfit, high-energy anime illustration, preserve identity
expressions.negative_prompt: sad, calm, sleepy, formal clothes, dark atmosphere, text, watermark, mutation, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 大喜び（先輩を見つけた時）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Kasugai Yuzu same character as reference, face/headshot, wavy brown-tinted hair with energetic bounce, large brown eyes extremely bright and sparkling, radiant genuine smile showing pure happiness, slight blush of joy, calling out 'Senpai!' energy, hair ribbon, cute pastel outfit, warm cheerful lighting, high-detail anime illustration, preserve identity, focus on purely joyful face
expressions.negative_prompt: sad, angry, sleepy, dull expression, formal clothes, dark atmosphere, text, watermark, mutation, bad anatomy, blurry

workflow_recommendation.step1: Upload 02_Characters/images/Yuzu/Yuzu1.png to NanoBananaPro as reference (Face ID / Character Ref enabled)
workflow_recommendation.step2: Set reference_strength to ~0.85 to lock identity (wavy brown-tinted hair, large round brown eyes, youthful innocent appearance)
workflow_recommendation.step3: Generate each expression with corresponding positive_prompt and negative_prompt; use 1:1 crop focusing on face
workflow_recommendation.step4: Adjust denoising_strength per expression for subtle vs. drastic changes (0.35-0.48)
workflow_recommendation.step5: Save outputs with suggested filenames: Yuzu_Neutral.png, Yuzu_Shy.png, Yuzu_Excited.png, etc.
